title: Tim Reed: Positions, Relations and Network - MarketScreener
snippet: Prior to that, he was the VP Marketing ... President Marketing at Engage PR LLC from 2001 to 2003. He was the President of the Business Council of Australia from 2019 to 2024....

title: Tim Reed | Business News
snippet: Mr Reed holds a Master of Business Administration from Harvard Business School, graduating as Baker Scholar, and a Bachelor of Commerce (Honours) from the University of Melbourne.

title: Tim Reed - AICD
snippet: Tim is Co-Managing Director of Potentia Capital, an Australian private equity firm that invests in and grows local software businesses; President of the Business Council of Australia, a role he assumed in 2019 having sat on the BCA Board since 2017, and non-Executive Director of Transurban Ltd.
